addon.name: Keep It Simple Stupid Sync Client

extension.summary: Keep track of your videos' watched state across multiple devices.
extension.description: This service synchronizes all of your watched videos across multiple devices through the use of a centralized, self-hosted web server so that you can go from the couch to the bedroom and pick up where you left off without any effort.
extension.disclaimer: This add-on requires a KISS-Sync-Server to connect to
